participant_1.background:
I love to visit music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store.
I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I eat my feelings.
I want to be a good role model for my daughters.

participant_2.background:
I used to play with animals, but now I'm too busy with my work.
I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy.
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.

content.text: What is your favorite way to relax?
I love to play video games. They are the perfect way to escape from the stress of everyday life.
I know what you mean. I love playing video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I love playing open world RPGs, like Skyrim and the Witcher 3. I also enjoy playing strategy games, like Civilization and XCOM.
Those are great games. I love the Witcher 3. I have spent so many hours playing that game.
It is such a great game. I love the story and the characters.
What is your favorite thing about the game?
I love the freedom of exploration. I can go wherever I want and do whatever I want.
That is what I love about it too. I can just get lost in the world of the game.
Me too. I can play it for hours and hours and not get bored.
I have a feeling we would be good friends.
